greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows, A122414 * A000012; 1<=k<=n.
comment: Row sums = A008472, the sum of distinct primes dividing n: (0, 2, 3, 2, 5, 5, 7, 2, 3, 7,...). Example: a(10) = 7 = 2 + 5.
formula: Triangle read by rows, A122414 * A000012; 1<=k<=n. By rows, partial sums of A122414 terms starting from the right.
example: First few rows of the triangle =
Example: row 6 = (2, 2, 1, 0, 0, 0) = partial sums starting from the right of row 6, A122414: (0, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0).
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Aug 23 2008
